episodes.title: My experience in a religious cult | Lagos ICC | Recruitment Tactics | Control | Isolation | Part 2
episodes.description: Thank you so much for stopping by. This is the second part of the series I started a few days ago about my experience in a cult-like church in Lagos State. In this video, I shared a time when they manipulated me into believing that someone had sexually abused me, all to make me hate the person and prevent me from leaving the church. At the time, I had no idea that this was happening because I trusted them. Now, looking back, I can clearly see that it was simply a manipulative control tactic to keep me from leaving.

episodes.title: Surviving a cult-like church - My story of manipulation I braids |DIY| church cult| ICC
